= WimWiki =

see :h vimwiki-syntax

== Basic Markup ==

  = Header1
  == Header2 ==
  === Header3 ===

  *bold* -- bold text
  _italic_ -- italic text
  ~~strikeout text ~~
  `code (no syntax) text`
  super^script^
  sub,,script,,
  [[wiki link]] - wiki link
  [[wiki link|description]] -- wiki link with description

Furthermore, there are a number of words which are highlighted extra flashy:
TODO, DONE, STARTED, FIXME, FIXED, XXX.
